english: There is no denying that she is very efficient.

english: They demanded the king be put to death at once.

english: This carpet is superior to that one in quality.

english: Those records are not accessible to the public.

english: Thousands of foreigners visit Japan every year.

english: Tom always gets lost if he doesn't carry a map.

english: Tom and I aren't friends. We're just coworkers.

english: Tom asked for Mary's permission to leave early.

english: Tom begged his father to buy him a new bicycle.

english: Tom came over to my house for dinner yesterday.

english: Tom checked the TV schedule to see what was on.

english: Tom could've figured that out without any help.

english: Tom did better this time than he did last time.

english: Tom didn't let his children go to Mary's party.

english: Tom folded the paper before handing it to Mary.

english: Tom has no friends who are willing to help him.

english: Tom hasn't yet told us what he wants us to buy.

english: Tom is trying to figure out how to do that now.

english: Tom isn't doing what he's supposed to be doing.

english: Tom knows you better than he knows anyone else.

chinese: tom 兩點半可能會到，不過，也可能不會
english: Tom might be here by 2:30, but then, maybe not.

english: Tom probably wouldn't do something that stupid.

english: Tom said he thought Mary was unhappy in Boston.

english: Tom said he wasn't sure what Mary wanted to do.

Tom said that he's considered quitting his job.

chinese: 湯姆給瑪麗畫了大象的素描。
english: Tom sketched a picture of an elephant for Mary.

chinese: 湯姆想說服瑪麗給他織一條圍巾。
english: Tom tried to convince Mary to knit him a scarf.

chinese: 湯姆本該往左轉卻往右轉了。
english: Tom turned right when he should've turned left.

chinese: 湯姆想追隨他父親的腳步。
english: Tom wanted to follow in his father's footsteps.

chinese: 湯姆想知道哪裡能買到薑黃。

chinese: Tom想知道你是否有時間幫助他。
english: Tom wants to know if you have time to help him.

chinese: 湯姆因無證駕駛而被逮捕。
english: Tom was arrested for driving without a license.

chinese: 湯姆是告訴我們問題的人。
english: Tom was the one that told us about the problem.

english: Tom whispered something to Mary and she smiled.

chinese: 湯姆努力工作掙了好多錢。
english: Tom worked very hard and earned a lot of money.

chinese: 我們在嚴肅地談論你的未來。

chinese: 我小時候的時候還沒有電腦。

chinese: 我們養了兩隻狗、三隻貓和六隻雞。
english: We have two dogs, three cats, and six chickens.

english: We often watch TV while we're eating breakfast.

chinese: 我們承諾萬一他有麻煩的時候支持他。

english: He is on goods terms with all of his classmates.

english: He is very influential in the world of medicine.

english: He left his parents when he was eight years old.

english: He was the strongest candidate for the position.

english: I could swear there's something inside this box.

english: I did that, even though I didn't really need to.

chinese: 我都沒想過會在這裡碰見你。
english: I didn't expect to see you at a place like this.

english: I didn't know that Tom was going to be arrested.

chinese: 他們說了什麼，我並不注意。

english: I don't believe you. You're always telling lies.

english: I don't even know if Tom went to college or not.

english: I don't mind if you go to bed before I get home.

english: I don't think I'll be able to get there on time.

chinese: 我有個朋友的父親是知名的作家。
english: I have a friend whose father is a famous writer.

chinese: 我去車站的路上路過了市政廳。
english: I passed the city hall on my way to the station.

chinese: 我覺得湯姆不太可能會當選。
english: I think it's unlikely that Tom will get elected.

chinese: 我覺得湯姆不太可能會當選。
english: I think that it's unlikely Tom will get elected.

chinese: 我想在出發旅行前剪個頭髮。
english: I want to get a haircut before I go on the trip.

chinese: 不知道明天天氣會怎麼樣呢？
english: I wonder what the weather will be like tomorrow.

english: I'd like to leave this town and never come back.

english: I have to write a letter. Do you have some paper?

chinese: 我用盡全力跑，但我還是沒趕上火車。

chinese: 我會把所有有用的信息給你的。

english: "Why aren't you going?" "Because I don't want to."
"Why aren't you going?" "Because I don't want to."

english: As soon as it gets dark, the fireworks will start.

english: Can you give me a ride to the office on Wednesday?

english: Dozens of young people attended the demonstration.

chinese: 雖然他很有錢，但他不幸福。
english: Even though he has a lot of money, he's not happy.

english: Every time he comes here, he orders the same dish.

english: He cleansed the wound before putting on a bandage.

english: He drove the car, listening to music on the radio.

chinese: 他試著想讓他妻子開心，但是沒有成功。
english: He endeavored to make his wife happy, but in vain.

He is busy preparing for the entrance examination.

chinese: 他強調了教育的重要性。
english: He placed emphasis on the importance of education.

chinese: 他學英語，但他也學德語。
english: He studies English, but he's also studying German.

chinese: 他給我們講了一個有趣的故事，我們都笑了起來。

chinese: 他戴著面具以至於沒有人認出他。
english: He wore a mask so that no one could recognize him.

english: How long does the airport bus take to the airport?

chinese: 我避免跟老闆討論箇人話題。
english: I avoid discussing personal subjects with my boss.

chinese: 我無法相信湯姆真的打算做這事兒。
english: I can't believe Tom is really planning to do this.

chinese: 我不明白為什麼你這麼批評他。
english: I can't understand why you are so critical of him.

english: I didn't trust Tom and he didn't trust me, either.

chinese: 我覺得不會有更多學生想來了。
english: I don't think that any more students want to come.

chinese: 今晚我非常享受和你的聊天。

chinese: 我希望他能來！我想見他。
english: I hope he'll be able to come! I'd like to see him.

chinese: 我槍殺了那匹馬，因為他已呼吸困難。

english: Is it necessary for me to explain the reason to him?

chinese: 駱駝可以撐很久不吃不喝。
english: The camel can go a long time without water and food.

chinese: 湖上的冰太薄了，承受不了你的重量。
english: The ice on the lake is too thin to bear your weight.

english: The party will be held outdoors, weather permitting.

english: The ship made slow progress against the strong wind.
The situation is getting worse and worse day by day.

chinese: 學生們在探討語言和文化。
english: The students are talking about language and culture.

english: The town was destroyed by the flood after the storm.

english: The wind blew too hard for them to play in the park.

chinese: 世界上有超過八十萬的巴斯克語使用者。
english: There are over 800,000 Basque speakers in the world.

chinese: 世界上有超過八十萬的人說巴斯克語。
english: There are over 800,000 Basque speakers in the world.

chinese: 他們對他們的員工保證就業。
english: They guaranteed regular employment to their workers.

chinese: 這是三十年代以來最乾旱的六月。
english: This has been the driest six months in thirty years.

chinese: 湯姆和瑪麗手牽著手，一起欣賞風景。
english: Tom and Mary admired the scenery as they held hands.

chinese: 湯姆和朋友們打了整個下午籃球。
english: Tom and his friends played basketball all afternoon.

chinese: 湯姆本可以用更好的方式處理問題。
english: Tom could've dealt with the problem in a better way.

chinese: 湯姆捐一半他的薪水給他最喜歡的慈善機構。
english: Tom donates half his salary to his favorite charity.

chinese: 湯姆捐獻了很多錢給這間醫院。
english: Tom has contributed a lot of money to this hospital.

chinese: 湯姆正要為我們剷掉屋頂上的雪。
english: Tom is going to shovel the snow off the roof for us.

chinese: 湯姆穿著昨天穿的衣服。
english: Tom is wearing the same clothes as he was yesterday.

chinese: 湯姆說他以為瑪麗在波士頓不快樂。
english: Tom said he thought that Mary was unhappy in Boston.

chinese: 湯姆說他還沒把事情完全搞明白。
english: Tom said that he didn't have it all figured out yet.

chinese: 湯姆說他以為瑪麗在波士頓不快樂。
english: Tom said that he thought Mary was unhappy in Boston.

chinese: 湯姆每天都花八個小時看電腦。
english: Tom sits in front of his computer eight hours a day.

chinese: 不幸的是，我必須每天早起。
english: Unfortunately, I have to get up early every morning.

chinese: 我們必須在週二早上之前完成所有事情。
english: We have to finish everything before Tuesday morning.

chinese: 我們必須考慮到他很年輕。
english: We must take into account the fact that he is young.

chinese: 我們視健康為理所當然, 直到疾病侵襲。
english: We take health for granted until illness intervenes.

chinese: 我們正要離開的時候下雨了。
english: We were just about to leave when it started raining.

chinese: 我們正要離開的時候下雨了。
english: We were just about to leave when it started to rain.

chinese: 你覺得我明天約會穿什麼好呢？
english: What do you think I should wear on my date tomorrow?

chinese: 當我聽到這首歌，我想起了你，並想念著你。
english: When I hear this song, I think of you, and miss you.

chinese: 他小時候，星期天會去釣魚。
english: When he was a child, he would go fishing on Sundays.

english: Why is everyone being so nice to me all of a sudden?

chinese: 上大學的時候，你得到的比付出的還多。
english: You gain more than you spend when you go to college.

chinese: 早知如此，就不應該借錢給他。
english: You should have known better than to lend him money.

chinese: 你不應該借錢給這樣的人。
english: You should not have lent the money to such a person.

chinese: 幾年前，我們的房間裡沒有什麼傢俱。
english: A few years ago, our room had little furniture in it.

chinese: 一個外國語言無法在一年左右就被掌握。
english: A foreign language can't be mastered in a year or so.

chinese: 緩期執行在最後關頭決定了下來。
english: A stay of execution was ordered at the eleventh hour.

chinese: 所謂陌生人，只是還未相見的友人而已。
english: A stranger is just a friend that you haven't met yet.

chinese: 看了信之後，她把它撕成碎片。
english: After she had read the letter, she tore it to pieces.

chinese: 走了一個小時後，我們停下來休息。
english: After walking for an hour, we stopped to take a rest.

chinese: 人造皮革是比不上真皮的。
english: Artificial leather can't compare with the real thing.

chinese: 只要好人袖手旁觀，惡人就會得勝。
english: As long as good people do nothing, evil will triumph.

chinese: 澳大利亞是世界第五大煤炭產地。
english: Australia is the world's fifth-largest coal producer.

chinese: 因為堵車， 我開會遲到了。
english: Because there was traffic, I was late to the meeting.

chinese: 你明天早上七點可不可以叫我起床。
english: Can you wake me up at seven o'clock tomorrow morning?

chinese: 您覺得您無法與他人交流嗎？
english: Do you feel like you can't connect with other people?

chinese: 你知道春捲為什麼叫春捲嗎？
english: Do you know why spring rolls are called spring rolls?

chinese: 這本雜誌不要扔。我還沒看呢。
english: Don't throw out this magazine. I haven't read it yet.

chinese: 全世界許多國家的人說英語。
english: English is spoken in many countries around the world.

chinese: 我們每天早上到公園裡遛狗。
english: Every morning we take the dog for a walk in the park.

chinese: 除了湯姆以外任何人都知道他沒必要這麼做。
english: Everyone but Tom knew that he didn't need to do that.
Feel free to get yourself a drink if you are thirsty.

chinese: 新鮮水果和蔬菜有益健康。
english: Fresh fruits and vegetables are good for your health.

chinese: 因為曾遇見過那個女孩，我馬上就認出來了。
english: Having met the girl before, I recognized her at once.

chinese: 他從早到晚只是在抱怨。
english: He does nothing but complain from morning till night.

chinese: 他不是那麼出色的作家我想他知道這一點。
english: He's not such a great writer and I think he knows it.

chinese: 你看完這本書要多少時間？
english: How long did it take you to finish reading that book?

chinese: 你瞭解多少我寫在這裡的東西?

chinese: 我承認，我不是世界上最整潔的人。
english: I admit that I'm not the tidiest person in the world.

english: I don't think that I'll be able to get there on time.

english: I don't understand why pepperoni pizza is so popular.

english: I had hardly left home when it began to rain heavily.

english: I hear you passed the entrance exam. Congratulations!

chinese: 我知道我把它放在地下室的某個地方了。

english: I think that it's unlikely that Tom will get elected.

chinese: 我想試試這件。請問哪裡是試衣間？

english: I'll arrange for someone to pick you up at your home.

english: I'm now rich enough to afford to get anything I want.

english: If you have a question, please raise your right hand.

english: If you pass this test, you could graduate next month.

english: It is said that his father died in a foreign country.

chinese: 他來不來對我來說沒區別。

chinese: 在我看來，她有一種誇張的傾向。

english: My father has been in good shape since his operation.

english: She lost her way and on top of that it began to rain.

chinese: 湯姆的鞋底粘了口香糖。
english: There was some chewing gum on the sole of Tom's shoe.

chinese: 沒有比失去孩子更傷心的事。

english: They will hold a meeting at 2 o'clock this afternoon.

chinese: 這裡是我餘生想待的地方
english: This is where I want to live for the rest of my life.

chinese: 這場暴風雨並不危險。你不用擔心。
english: This storm is not dangerous. You don't need to worry.

english: Tom and Mary even always wear the same color clothes.

chinese: Tom在離這裡不遠的一家商店裡買了一臺相機。
english: Tom bought a camera at a store not too far from here.

chinese: 湯姆今天來得比往常要早一些。
english: Tom came a little earlier today than he usually does.

english: Tom could write his name when he was three years old.

chinese: 湯姆不知道他的所作所為違反了規則。
english: Tom didn't know what he'd done was against the rules.

chinese: 湯姆希望瑪麗不會跟約翰談戀愛。
english: Tom didn't like the idea of Mary going out with John.

chinese: 湯姆已經在這裡了，但瑪麗還沒到。
english: Tom is already here, but Mary hasn't gotten here yet.

chinese: 湯姆用盡了火柴，不能點火了。
english: Tom ran out of matches so he couldn't light the fire.

chinese: 湯姆說他覺得那可能永遠不會發生了。
english: Tom said he thought that would probably never happen.

chinese: 湯姆說他打掃屋子打掃了一天。
english: Tom said that he had been cleaning the house all day.

chinese: 湯姆說他覺得他該學法語。
english: Tom said that he thought that he should study French.

chinese: Tom告訴我他們有想要娶你的想法。
english: Tom told me that he has no intention of marrying you.

chinese: 湯姆不會告訴瑪麗他做那件事的真實原因。
english: Tom won't tell Mary the real reason that he did that.

chinese: 我們很期待見到您和您的家人。
english: We are looking forward to seeing you and your family.

chinese: 雖然有三間空屋，但哪間都用不了。
english: We have three spare rooms, none of which can be used.

english: We have to look into the disappearance of the doctor.

chinese: 我們只是需要確認Tom有要來這。
english: We just have to make sure Tom is planning to be here.

chinese: 我們看了窗外，但什麼都沒看見。
english: We looked out the window, but we didn't see anything.

chinese: 我們得到了在這個海灣內捕魚的特權。
english: We were granted the privilege of fishing in this bay.

chinese: 我要說的只能是你知我知。
english: What I'm about to say is strictly between you and me.

chinese: 我要告訴你的只能你我知道。
english: What I'm about to say is strictly between you and me.

chinese: 幼年時學的東西，一輩子不會忘記。
english: What is learned in the cradle is carried to the tomb.

chinese: 他來還是不來，結果是一樣的。
english: Whether he comes or not, the result will be the same.

chinese: 不管你選哪條路，你都能按時到那裡。
english: Whichever route you take, you will get there in time.

chinese: 為什麼你這個禮拜每天上學都遲到？
english: Why have you been late to school every day this week?

chinese: 你想出去喝幾杯或吃個飯嗎？
english: Would you like to go for a drink or something to eat?

chinese: 除非你想去, 否則你不必去這個派對。
english: You don't have to go to the party unless you want to.

chinese: 你看起來很累。你應該休息一兩個小時。
english: You look tired. You ought to rest for an hour or two.
You should look after the children from time to time.

chinese: 你是那個建議我們一起旅行的人。
english: You're the one who suggested that we travel together.

chinese: 喝了幾杯酒後，這個傢伙就感覺不痛了。
english: After a couple of drinks, the guy was feeling no pain.

chinese: 不正確的命題聽起來可能符合邏輯。
english: An argument may be logically sound without being true.

chinese: 顯然，今天什麼事都有可能發生。
english: Apparently, there is nothing that cannot happen today.

chinese: 我之前跟你說過，那個你必須自己做。
english: As I told you before, you have to do that by yourself.

chinese: 當我們走到轉角處，湖就映入了眼簾。
english: As we went around the corner, the lake came into view.

chinese: 以前讀高中的時候﹐我每天早上六點起床。
english: Back in high school, I got up at 6 a.m. every morning.

chinese: 出去釣魚前，他挖出一些蟲子當餌。
english: Before he went fishing, he dug up some worms for bait.

chinese: 除了鋼琴以外，還會玩什麼樂器嗎？
english: Besides the piano, can you play any other instruments?

chinese: 我就只告訴你，我不喜歡我們的新隊長。
english: Between you and me, I don't like our new team captain.

chinese: 一口氣吹滅生日蛋糕上所有的蠟燭。
english: Blow out all the candles on the birthday cake at once.

chinese: 你可不可以幫忙除草澆花？
english: Could you please pull the weeds and water the flowers?

chinese: 你能提出解決問題的方法嗎？
english: Could you possibly suggest a way to solve the problem?

chinese: 您碰巧有一本額外的英文字典嗎？
english: Do you have an extra English dictionary by any chance?

chinese: 這本雜誌不要扔。我還沒看呢。
english: Don't throw away this magazine. I haven't read it yet.

chinese: 英語是當今世界上一種非常重要的語言。
english: English is a very important language in today's world.

chinese: 除了湯姆以外任何人都知道他沒必要這麼做。
english: Everybody but Tom knew that he didn't need to do that.

chinese: 事實是倔強的，但統計是柔順的。
english: Facts are stubborn things, but statistics are pliable.

chinese: 一般來說, 男人比女人跑得快。
english: Generally speaking, men can run faster than women can.

chinese: 在你讀完後，把書還給我。
english: Give me the book back once you've finished reading it.

chinese: 他讓妹妹幫他塗他房間的牆。
english: He had his sister help him paint the wall of his room.

chinese: 考慮到他缺乏經驗，他做得[已經]非常好了。
english: He is doing very well considering he lacks experience.

chinese: 他利用這個機會提高英語水平。
english: He made use of the opportunity to improve his English.

chinese: 他很快就適應了新環境。

chinese: “我們從2009年起就沒見過面。”“有那麼久嗎？”
english: "We haven't seen each other since 2009." "Has it been that long?"

chinese: “你明天會來我的聚會嗎？”“我儘量來。”
english: "Will you be at my party tomorrow night?" "I'll try to be there."

chinese: 已經花費了很多的時間和精力。
english: A considerable amount of time and effort have been spent already.

chinese: 要想成功只需要無知和自信。
english: All you need is ignorance and confidence and the success is sure.

chinese: 事實上，我從今天早上開始沒有吃任何東西。
english: As a matter of fact, I haven't eaten anything since this morning.

chinese: 澳大利亞在歐洲是最大的電能生產國之一。
english: Austria is one of the largest producers of electricity in Europe.

chinese: 你有幾分鐘時間嗎？我想跟你聊一下。
english: Can you spare me a few minutes? I'd like to have a word with you.

chinese: 我都快要說出他的名字了，可就是記不起來。
english: His name was on the tip of my tongue, but I couldn't remember it.

chinese: 我去澳大利亞旅遊的時候第一次穿越了赤道。
english: I crossed the equator for the first time on my trip to Australia.

chinese: 我的雨傘遺失在公園裡某個地方。我必須再買一把。
english: I have lost my umbrella somewhere in the park. I have to buy one.

chinese: 好久不見了。記得上次我什麼時候看見你的嗎？
english: I haven't seen you for ages. Do you remember when I saw you last?

chinese: 希望下次我在紐約還可以有機會見到你。
english: I hope I will have a chance to see you next time I'm in New York.

chinese: 我當時正忙著打包，因為我兩天後要去法國。
english: I was busy packing, because I was leaving for France in two days.

chinese: 我想要打個電話到日本東京，號碼是3202－5625。
english: I'd like to make a call to Tokyo, Japan. The number is 3202-5625.

chinese: 在加拿大有很多區域砍伐樹木是非法的。
english: In Canada, there are many areas where it is illegal to log trees.

chinese: 再過兩週你就可以出院了。
english: In another two weeks you will be able to get out of the hospital.

chinese: 萬一船運遲了，我們有特別的遲到保險。
english: In case the shipment is delayed, we have special delay insurance.

chinese: 這個週末去紐約對你來說是不可能的事。
english: It is out of the question for you to go to New York this weekend.

chinese: 在學校時我學了中文是個優勢。
english: It was an advantage having learned Chinese while I was in school.

chinese: 生活就是當你忙著進行你的計劃時總有其他的事情發生。
english: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.

chinese: 錢要花很長的時間來賺, 但你可以一下子就花掉它了。
english: Money takes a long time to earn, but you can spend it in no time.

chinese: 我的辦公室在那幢灰色的六層樓的四樓。
english: My office is on the fourth floor of that gray six-story building.

chinese: 壞習慣一旦被養成，便不能簡單地改正。
english: Once you have formed a bad habit, you can't get rid of it easily.

chinese: 我花園裡的一部分玫瑰是白色的，其他的是紅色的。
english: Some of the roses in my garden are white, and the others are red.

chinese: 通常學生們喜歡理解他們問題的老師。
english: Students generally like a teacher who understands their problems.

chinese: 這個嬰兒盯著我的原子筆看, 並且伸手要拿它。
english: The baby caught sight of my ballpoint pen and reached out for it.

chinese: 花園裡樹上的葉子已經完全變紅了。
english: The leaves of the trees in the garden have turned completely red.

chinese: 這班火車如此的擁擠以至於我整個車程都必須站著。
english: The train was so crowded that I had to keep standing all the way.

chinese: 這將是我環繞美國旅行中一個很好的紀念品。
english: This will be a good souvenir of my trip around the United States.

chinese: 湯姆忘記跟瑪莉說會議幾點開始。
english: Tom forgot to tell Mary what time the meeting was going to start.

chinese: 湯姆應該知道這附近哪裡有東西吃。
english: Tom probably knows where we can get something to eat around here.

chinese: 請給我兩張到倫敦的成人票，三張兒童票。
english: Two adult tickets and three children's tickets to London, please.

chinese: 湯姆真正想要的是有足夠的錢給瑪麗買一些花。
english: What Tom really wanted was enough money to buy Mary some flowers.

chinese: 當她在洛杉磯的時候, 她至少有六份工作。
english: When she was in Los Angeles, she had at least six different jobs.

chinese: 讓我們別來，我們就更想來了。
english: When we are told not to come, we become all the more eager to go.

chinese: 因為颱風的關係，我的父母提早一天結束了旅行回到家。
english: Because of the typhoon, my parents ended their trip one day early.

chinese: 四億人以英語作為他們的第一語言。
english: Four hundred million people speak English as their first language.

chinese: 他似乎不知道我父親和我之間的糾葛。
english: He seems not to be aware of the conflict between my father and me.

chinese: 他是一位優秀的科學家，更是一位偉大的詩人。
english: He was an excellent scientist, and what is more, was a great poet.

chinese: 因為酷暑一直持續著，請務必注意食物中毒。
english: Hot weather will continue, so please watch out for food poisoning.

chinese: 因為酷暑一直持續著，請謹防食物中毒。
english: Hot weather will continue, so please watch out for food poisoning.

chinese: 我很高興他們修復了暖氣系統，但現在太熱了。
english: I'm glad that they fixed the heating system, but now it's too hot.

chinese: 我現在要去湯姆家告訴他發生了什麼。
english: I'm going over to Tom's house now to tell him about what happened.

chinese: 獅子是獸類之王的話，鷹就是鳥類之王。
english: If the lion is the king of beasts, the eagle is the king of birds.

chinese: 如果你沒好話說，那就什麼都別說。
english: If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say anything at all.

chinese: 如果你早點出門的話，你就能趕上了。
english: If you had left home a little earlier you would have been in time.

chinese: 儘管雨下得很大，但他還是去醫院看望他的朋友了。
english: In spite of the heavy rain, he visited his friend in the hospital.

chinese: 看來他只有在睡覺時不吃東西。
english: It seems that the only time he isn't eating is when he's sleeping.

chinese: 做計劃是一碼事，付諸實踐是另一碼事。
english: It's one thing to make plans, but quite another to carry them out.
It's one thing to make plans, but quite another to carry them out.

chinese: 上個月，我們20歲的女兒生了個女孩。
english: Last month our twenty-year-old daughter gave birth to a baby girl.

chinese: 我的車今天早上壞了，星期五才能修好。
english: My car broke down this morning and won't be repaired until Friday.

chinese: 我父親總是說天助自助者。
english: My father always said that heaven helps those who help themselves.

chinese: 我在國外旅行的時候，我老婆老給我打電話。
english: My wife often telephones me when I'm traveling in another country.

chinese: 不管我跟她說了多少次，她還是繼續犯同樣的錯誤。
english: No matter how often I tell her, she keeps making the same mistake.

chinese: 這個班的女生平均身高超過了155公分。
english: The average height of girls in this class is over 155 centimeters.

chinese: 海豚和馴養員交流得比我們所期望的好得多。
english: The dolphin and trainer communicated much better than we expected.

chinese: 近來咖啡的短缺造成了許多問題。
english: The recent shortage of coffee has given rise to a lot of problems.

chinese: 最近的咖啡短缺帶來了許多問題。
english: The recent shortage of coffee has given rise to a lot of problems.

chinese: 湯姆把那個大野餐籃子放在他旁邊的乘客座位上。
english: Tom put the large picnic basket on the passenger seat next to him.

chinese: 湯姆想要瑪麗的電話號碼但是被拒絕了。
english: Tom wanted Mary's phone number, but she refused to give it to him.

chinese: 在湯姆欣賞我的新車的同時，一輛卡車撞了過來。
english: Tom was admiring my new car at the time the truck crashed into it.

chinese: 湯姆穿著一件防彈衣，所以子彈沒把他殺死。
english: Tom was wearing a bulletproof vest, so the bullet didn't kill him.

chinese: 暴風雪使得我們難以返回營地。
english: We found it very hard going back to our base camp in the blizzard.

chinese: 你已經辛苦地工作好幾個月了, 當然可以休假。
english: You've worked hard for months and have certainly earned a holiday.

chinese: “好人不長命”是句或真或假的老話。
english: "The good die young" is an old saying which may or may not be true.

chinese: 那個地點的書店無法賺足夠的錢生存下去。
english: A bookstore in that location wouldn't make enough money to survive.

chinese: 一年過去了，但彷彿我們昨天還見過面似的。
english: A year has passed, but it's as if we saw each other only yesterday.

chinese: 由於他的財富，他能夠成為這個俱樂部的成員。
english: Because of his wealth, he was able to become a member of that club.

chinese: 大家都渴望知道前冠軍得主發生了什麼。
english: Everyone is anxious to know what has become of the former champion.

chinese: 首先，我要你跟我一起去百貨公司的特價活動。
english: First off, I'd like you to come with me to a department store sale.

chinese: 他總是把孩子的教育問題留給他的妻子。
english: He always left the problem of his children's education to his wife.

chinese: 他宣佈他將立刻來調查此事。
english: He announced that he would come at once and investigate the matter.
He devoted the last years of his life to writing his autobiography.

chinese: 他在城市裡一直受到噪音或者其他的干擾。
english: He was always annoyed in the city by noises of one sort or another.

chinese: 他的妻子在醫院裡因為她在一場車禍中受傷了。
english: His wife is in the hospital because she was injured in a car crash.

chinese: 我有太多話想和你說，以至於不知從何說起。
english: I have so many things to tell you that I don't know where to start.

chinese: 我十四歲的時候，父親死於蛛網膜下出血。
english: I lost my father to a subarachnoid haemorrhage when I was fourteen.

chinese: 我不是小孩子，但有時你跟我說話就好像我是小孩子一樣。
english: I'm not a child, but sometimes you talk to me as if I were a child.

chinese: 如果你聽到她講的英語，你會以為她是美國人呢。
english: If you heard her speak English, you would take her for an American.

chinese: 這種天氣下最好待在家裡不要外出。
english: In this kind of weather, it's best to stay home and not go outside.

chinese: 翻譯幾頁英文花了我2個多小時。
english: It took me more than two hours to translate a few pages of English.

chinese: 她開始對生態學感興趣，是受到他的影響。
english: It was through his influence that she became interested in ecology.

chinese: 如果我們照了湯姆的話去做這一切都是沒必要的。
english: None of this would've been necessary if we'd followed Tom's advice.

chinese: 請不要忘記寄信前要在上面貼郵票。
english: Please don't forget to put a stamp on the letter before mailing it.

chinese: 她一勞永逸地告訴我，她不想再見我了。
english: She told me once and for all that she did not want to see me again.

chinese: 瑞士位於法國、意大利、奧地利和德國之間。
english: Switzerland is situated between France, Italy, Austria and Germany.

chinese: 教師用手指指著我，要我跟她走。
english: The teacher pointed her finger at me and asked me to come with her.

chinese: 發現了遠處的燈光的旅行者歡喜不已。
english: The traveler was delighted at the sight of a light in the distance.

chinese: 這幅畫被估價數百萬元。
english: The value of the painting was estimated at several million dollars.

chinese: 今天教室裡的學生比昨天還要多。
english: There are many more students in the classroom today than yesterday.

chinese: 有一分鐘的沉默，然後每個人都開始尖叫。
english: There was a minute of silence and then everybody started screaming.

chinese: 這只是你和我之間的秘密，所以不要讓它流出去。
english: This is a secret just between you and me, so don't let it slip out.

chinese: 這個問題讓小學生解決太難了。
english: This problem is too difficult for primary school children to solve.

chinese: 你應該為你沒有及時回家吃晚餐向你父親道歉。
english: You should apologize to Dad for not coming home in time for supper.

chinese: 要是你老打遊戲的話，你的視力會下降的。
english: You're going to wreck your eyesight if you play games all the time.

chinese: 根據指南，這是這附近最好的餐館。
english: According to the guidebook, this is the best restaurant around here.

chinese: 你知不知道全世界每年有多少人餓死呀？
english: Do you know how many people in the world starve to death every year?

chinese: 父親確定所有的燈都關了後才去睡覺。
english: Father makes sure that all the lights are off before he goes to bed.

chinese: 我記不起昨天查的那個詞的意思了。
english: I can't remember the meaning of the word that I looked up yesterday.

chinese: 我知道湯姆會成為一位優秀的籃球教練。這就是為什麼我聘用了他。
english: I knew Tom would be a good basketball coach. That's why I hired him.

chinese: 我覺得李斯特的《被遺忘的圓舞曲第三首》是個被埋沒的名曲。
english: I think that Liszt's "Forgotten Waltz No.3" is a hidden masterpiece.

chinese: 你明天來的時候，我就看完這本小說了。
english: I'll have finished reading this novel by the time you come tomorrow.

chinese: 我從沒有在農場住，但我的父母都在農場長大。
english: I've never lived on a farm, but both of my parents grew up on farms.

chinese: 如果兩個人總是意見相同，那麼他們其中一個就沒必要了。
english: If two men always have the same opinion, one of them is unnecessary.

chinese: 在一些國家，叛國罪的懲罰可以是終身監禁。
english: In some countries, the punishment for treason can be life in prison.

chinese: 根據你所說的話，我認為我們應該重新審視我們的計劃。
english: In the light of what you told us, I think we should revise our plan.

chinese: 法語說得快，我就難以理解。
english: It's difficult for me to understand French when it's spoken quickly.

chinese: 我今早起床時，我爸已經吃過早飯了。
english: My father had already finished breakfast when I got up this morning.

chinese: 我父親有個習慣，早餐之前讀報紙。
english: My father is in the habit of reading the newspaper before breakfast.

chinese: 這個小島上有兩座大城市及許多小村鎮。
english: On this small island are two large towns and many small settlements.

chinese: 我們的任務到目前為止很輕鬆，但從現在開始將會變得很難。
english: Our task has been easy so far, but it will be difficult from now on.

chinese: 死刑在美國的很多州都被廢除了。
english: The death penalty had been done away with in many states in the USA.

chinese: 因為閃光燈壞了，他不能在黑暗中拍照。
english: The flash wasn't working, so he couldn't take a picture in the dark.

chinese: 一個差勁的廚師和下毒者唯一的不同在於他們的意圖。
english: The only difference between a bad cook and a poisoner is the intent.

chinese: 在2015年9月日本的失業率為3.4％。
english: The unemployment rate in Japan was 3.4 percent in September of 2015.

chinese: 湯姆讓我告訴你他沒有計劃和你一起去波士頓。
english: Tom asked me to tell you he didn't plan on going to Boston with you.

chinese: 湯姆考試時沒時間答完所有題。
english: Tom didn't have enough time to answer all the questions on the test.

chinese: 湯姆最初是看門人，但現在他是公司的總裁了。
english: Tom started as a janitor, but he's now the president of the company.

chinese: 湯姆對瑪麗說，不要浪費時間去說服約翰來幫忙。
english: Tom told Mary not to waste her time trying to convince John to help.

chinese: 湯姆想學拳擊，但他媽媽覺得這太危險了。
english: Tom wants to learn boxing, but his mother thinks it's too dangerous.

chinese: 你知道他們什麼時候到嗎？ 今晚11點半。
english: "Do you know when they will arrive?" "At eleven-thirty this evening."

chinese: 堅持做對的事情。這會滿足一部分人同時使另一部分人感到驚訝。
english: Always do right. This will gratify some people and astonish the rest.

chinese: 即使太陽從西邊出來，我也不會改變主意。
english: Even if the sun were to rise in the west, I would not change my mind.

chinese: 每個人都在談論天氣, 但是沒有人為它做任何事情。
english: Everybody talks about the weather, but nobody does anything about it.

chinese: 我和他在學生時代是分不開的朋友。
english: He and I were inseparable friends during our time together in school.

chinese: 他似乎不知道我父親和我之間的糾葛。
english: He doesn't seem to be aware of the conflict between my father and me.

chinese: 他的智慧和經驗使他能處理這個麻煩。
english: His intelligence and experience enabled him to deal with the trouble.

chinese: 我感情上支持，但是理性上反對。
english: I agree on an emotional level, but on the pragmatic level I disagree.

chinese: 我看不出有其他方法能讓他接受我們的提議。
english: I can't think of any other way of getting him to accept our proposal.

chinese: 我認為在有風暴的時候裡登山很危險。
english: I think it's dangerous to climb a mountain on a day when it's stormy.

chinese: 我想掙點錢，所以我一週打三天小時工。
english: I wanted to earn some money, so I worked part time three days a week.

chinese: 如果不是因為有你的幫助，我不可能完成了這個工作。
english: If it had not been for your help, I couldn't have completed the work.

chinese: 我們將於幾分鐘內降落在新東京國際機場。
english: In a few minutes we'll be landing at New Tokyo International Airport.

chinese: 授之以魚，不如授之以漁。
english: It's better to teach someone how to fish than to give someone a fish.

chinese: 很明顯的是這兩者之間有很強烈的分歧。
english: It's clear that there's a rather strong disagreement between the two.

chinese: 真難相信湯姆不知道瑪麗愛他。
english: It's hard to believe Tom wasn't aware that Mary was in love with him.

chinese: 大多數美國人似乎不反對我直呼其名。
english: Most Americans do not object to my calling them by their first names.

chinese: 沒有人會為這個舊建築物的拆除而落淚。
english: Nobody's going to shed any tears if that old building gets torn down.

chinese: 雖然她在日本被撫養長大，但是她精通英語。
english: She has a good command of English though she was brought up in Japan.

chinese: 她充分利用她住在倫敦的優勢，提高英語。
english: She took full advantage of her stay in London to improve her English.

chinese: 援救人員為了找到孩子，仔細搜索了那個區域。
english: The rescuers searched the surroundings in hopes of finding the child.
The taller the tree, the more likely it is to be struck by lightning.

chinese: 沒有什麼比做事缺乏熱情更糟。
english: There is nothing worse than doing something in a half-hearted manner.

chinese: 我和湯姆在公園的長椅上坐著，一邊聊天一邊喂著鴿子。
english: Tom and I sat on a bench in the park and talked while we fed pigeons.

chinese: 湯姆及時趕到了車站搭上了他想搭的那列車。
english: Tom got to the station in time to catch the train he wanted to catch.

chinese: 我們已經收到了很多回應我們廣告的申請。
english: We've received a lot of applications in answer to our advertisements.

chinese: 由於下大雪，從北京來的班機延遲二十分鐘。
english: Because of heavy snow, the plane from Beijing arrived 20 minutes late.

chinese: 你能告訴我紅茶和綠茶的區別嗎？
english: Can you describe to me the difference between black tea and green tea?

chinese: 別擔心! 即使我喝酒了, 它對我的駕駛沒有影響。
english: Don't worry! Even if I drink, it doesn't have an effect on my driving.

chinese: 要是他知道會發生什麼，他就會改變計劃。
english: Had he known what was about to happen, he would have changed his plan.

chinese: 由於錯過了火車，我不得不等下一班等一小時。
english: Having missed the train, I had to wait about an hour for the next one.

chinese: 我認為我聽懂了湯姆說的所有話，但我不確定。
english: I think I understood everything Tom said, but I'm not absolutely sure.

chinese: 我想你遲早會知道在桌面建立一個快捷方式是有多方便。
english: I think you will find it convenient to put a short-cut on the desktop.

english: I want a cellular phone, but I don't have enough money to pay for one.

chinese: 我正在尋找可以幫我修改這篇論文的母語人士。

chinese: 告訴你箇好玩的事，能驚你一下。

english: If I'd known that it would come to this, I would have never consented.

english: It was raining when we left, but by the time we arrived, it was sunny.

english: It's hard to tell Englishmen from Americans just by the way they look.

english: Rather than live a hundred years as a rabbit, live one day as a tiger.

english: There was a sprinkling of foreigners among the visitors in the museum.

english: Tom said Mary thought John might be permitted to do that next weekend.

english: Because it is written in simple English even a child can understand it.

chinese: 有空的時候，我總喜歡聽古典音樂。

english: I know that Tom knows that Mary knows that she doesn't have to do that.

english: I was nine years old when I asked my mom if Santa Claus really existed.

english: If you enjoy the work you do, you have something worth more than money.

english: It was not until I had a baby myself that I knew what mother's love is.

chinese: 善良是聾子能聽盲人能看的語言。

english: Mary came home from school in tears because her friends had teased her.

english: Tom began to sing "Happy Birthday" and the entire restaurant joined in.

english: Tom couldn't go to college because his family didn't have enough money.

english: When his food supply ran short, he had to look for a new place to live.

english: While I was reading in bed last night, I fell asleep with the light on.

chinese: 在我結婚之後，我的日語水平提高了，能理解更多日語了。
english: After I got married, my Japanese got better and I could understand more.

english: As I missed the train, I had to wait for the next one for about an hour.

chinese: 對了，前些時間你說傘不見了，現在找到了嗎？
english: By the way, did you find the umbrella you said you'd lost the other day?

english: Her eyes shone with joy when she saw that her mother was not mad at her.

chinese: 我不用曲膝就能把我的手掌放到地上。
english: I can place the palms of my hands on the floor without bending my knees.

chinese: 我十八歲時，學了開車、考到了駕照。
english: I learned to drive a car and got a driver's license when I was eighteen.

chinese: 我十八歲時，學了開車、考到了駕照。
english: I learned to drive a car when I was eighteen and got a driver's license.

chinese: 我本來預備今天去海灘的，但接著天就開始下雨了。
english: I was planning on going to the beach today, but then it started to rain.

chinese: 我想知道咱們是否有足夠的錢給湯姆買他想要的這幅畫。
english: I wonder whether we have enough money to buy Tom the painting he wanted.

chinese: 如果我們知道我們在做什麼，那麼這不能稱之為研究，是嗎？
english: If we knew what we were doing, it wouldn't be called research, would it?

chinese: 要是我們早十分鐘到的話，我們就能趕上飛機了。

chinese: 如果你想去，就去好了。如果你不想去，那也沒什麼大不了的。
english: If you want to go, then go. If you don't want to, then it's no big deal.

english: In the U.S., most people can vote when they reach eighteen years of age.

chinese: 得不到的東西就最想得到。
english: It is the things that we do not possess which seem to us most desirable.

chinese: 比起少抽菸，你何不直接把菸戒了？
english: Rather than cutting down on cigarettes, why don't you just give them up?

english: Sociopaths rarely display remorse or feelings of guilt for their crimes.
The company went public and became listed on the stock exchange in 1990.

english: The small hill turned out to be an ancient burial mound 2,000 years old.

english: Tom can't account for his whereabouts on the day that Mary was murdered.

english: Tom never forgets to give his wife flowers on their wedding anniversary.

english: You shouldn't share too much private information on the social networks.

english: Beer is taxed according to its malt content, so low-malt beer is cheaper.

chinese: 我想您要拿到駕照根本不難。

chinese: 我想你要拿到駕照根本不難。
english: I think you'll have very little difficulty in getting a driver's license.

english: If a sick person folds one thousand paper cranes, her wish will come true.

chinese: 湯姆說瑪麗覺得約翰下週末可能被允許那麼做。

chinese: 該國嚴禁進口稀有野生動物。

chinese: 湯姆覺得他有機會在股市賺一大筆錢。
english: Tom thought that he had a chance to make a lot of money on the stock market.

english: You said Mary was beautiful, but I didn't think she would be this beautiful.

chinese: 每一個人對事情的看法不同是依據他們是富有還是貧窮。
english: A person views things differently according to whether they are rich or poor.

chinese: 人們看待事情的角度不同取決於他們是富裕或貧窮。
english: A person views things differently according to whether they are rich or poor.

english: Although the government refuses to admit it, its economic policy is in ruins.

english: I had to cancel that order because we didn't have enough money to pay for it.

chinese: Mary試圖把圍裙圍在腰上，然後把烤雞從爐子裡拿出來。
english: Mary tied an apron around her waist and then took the turkey out of the oven.

chinese: 瑪麗把圍裙系在她的腰上，然後把火雞從烤箱裡拿出來了。
english: Mary tied an apron around her waist and then took the turkey out of the oven.

chinese: 人們看待事情的角度不同取決於他們是富裕或貧窮。
english: People look at things differently depending on whether they are rich or poor.

chinese: 奧運會最重要的不是獲勝，而是參與。
english: The most important thing in the Olympic Games is not winning but taking part.

chinese: 倫敦的人口遠遠多於其他英國城市的人口。
english: The population of London is much greater than that of any other British city.

chinese: 他們認為，去反駁一個不認識的人有些不禮貌。
english: They consider it impolite to disagree with someone they don't know very well.

chinese: 湯姆得出無論他做什麼，瑪麗都不會喜歡的結論。
english: Tom came to the conclusion that no matter what he did, Mary wouldn't like it.

chinese: 全世界百分之八十電腦上的資訊都是用英語寫的。
english: Eighty percent of all information on computers around the world is in English.

chinese: 我以為我們發現了絕妙的藏身之處，但警察找到了我們。
english: I thought that we had found the perfect hiding place, but the police found us.

chinese: 我是那種面對人群很緊張的人，所以我的演講能力很差。
english: I'm the type who gets nervous in front of people, so I'm bad at speech making.

chinese: 早上起來，嗓子變得很沙啞，我想是不是感冒了。
english: I've had a scratchy throat since this morning. I wonder if I've caught a cold.

chinese: 如果看起來像個蘋果而且吃起來也像蘋果的話，可能就是蘋果。
english: If it looks like an apple and it tastes like an apple, it's probably an apple.

chinese: 世界就像是一本書，走一步等於翻了一頁。
english: The world is just like a book, and every step you take is like turning a page.

chinese: 今天我本打算在圖書館學習，但到12點左右才醒。
english: Today, I was supposed to study at the library but I woke up around 12 o'clock.

chinese: 湯姆第一次上電視後就廣受青少年的歡迎。
english: Tom became popular among teenagers as soon as he made his debut on the screen.

chinese: Tom寫作可以寫的像本國人一樣，可是他的發音很爛
english: Tom can write almost like a native speaker, but his pronunciation is terrible.

chinese: 湯姆盡了全力，但他還是不能獲得比瑪麗更高的等級。
english: Tom did the best he could, but he wasn't able to get a higher grade than Mary.

chinese: 當列車停止時，所有的乘客都想知道發生了什麼。
english: As the train came to a halt, all of the passengers wondered what was happening.

chinese: 他的分數總比我高，儘管他學習得少一點。
english: His scores are always better than mine, even though he doesn't study very much.

chinese: 其實我工作並不多，但足以讓我這周在辦公室裡忙著了。
english: I don't have a lot of work, but it's enough to keep me in the office this week.

chinese: 我還了從圖書館借的書，又借了些新的。
english: I returned the books I borrowed from the library, and I borrowed some new ones.

chinese: 我父親的母語是法語，我母親的是英語。
english: My father is a native French speaker and my mother is a native English speaker.

chinese: 文章的發表被預定在教授生日那天。
english: Publication of the article was timed to coincide with the professor's birthday.

chinese: 她受歡迎不是因為她的美麗，而是因為她親切地對待每個人。
english: She's popular, not because she's beautiful, but because she's kind to everyone.

english: The telephone operator asked the caller to hold on until a connection was made.

chinese: 人們常說不要亂相信謠言，但說起來容易做起來難。

chinese: 用叉子和筷子的人經常覺得不用叉子和筷子的人不文明。

chinese: 那些說錢不能買來幸福的人，只是不知道上哪裡去買而已。
english: Whoever said money can't buy happiness simply didn't know where to go shopping.

chinese: 當時沒有任何以英語為母語的人在公立學校任教。

chinese: 交通事故是美國青少年死亡的主要原因。
english: Car accidents are the leading cause of death for teenagers in the United States.

chinese: 她被要求去說服他以讓他或者他的兒子或者是別的人來粉刷屋子。
english: She was asked to convince him to get his son or someone else to paint the house.

chinese: 湯姆總是說話聲音太小，我幾乎聽不懂他在說什麼。
english: Tom always speaks in such a low voice that I can barely understand what he says.

chinese: 湯姆說瑪麗覺得約翰下週末可能被允許那麼做。
english: Tom said that Mary thought that John might be permitted to do that next weekend.

chinese: 儘管我在學校學了6年英語，我還是說不好。
english: Even though I studied English for 6 years in school, I'm not good at speaking it.

chinese: 有時從辦公室回家的路上他會到這家書店看一看。
english: Every now and then he drops in at this bookstore on his way home from the office.

chinese: 我不知道這個城市，而且我一點都不懂那裡的語言。
english: I didn't know the city, and what's more, I couldn't speak a word of the language.

chinese: 兩個孩子的年齡加起來和他們的父親相當。
english: The ages of the two children put together was equivalent to that of their father.

chinese: 這把菜刀不夠鋒利，所以我用了我的摺疊刀來切肉。
english: The kitchen knife wasn't sharp enough to cut the meat, so I used my pocket knife.

chinese: 對工具箱裡只有一把榔頭的人來說，所有的問題都像釘子。
english: To the man who only has a hammer in the toolkit, every problem looks like a nail.

chinese: 湯姆去河裡游泳，但當他出來時，他的衣服被偷了。
english: Tom went swimming in the river, but when he got out, his clothes had been stolen.

chinese: 作為一個良好的交談者，並不只意味著作一個英語說得好的說話者。
english: Being a good conversationalist does not just mean being a good speaker of English.

chinese: 人孔是圓的，因為這樣人孔蓋就不會意外地掉進洞裡。
english: Manholes are round because that way they won't accidentally fall through the hole.

chinese: 你應該知道要為考試作準備。
english: You should have known better than to take an examination without preparing for it.

chinese: 科學上，血型和性格的關聯性沒有被證明。
english: A connection between personality and blood type has not been scientifically proven.

chinese: 他衣著像個紳士，言行舉止卻像個小丑。
english: His dress is that of a gentleman, but his speech and behavior are those of a clown.

chinese: 我剛跟你的法語老師談過話，他說你在課堂上表現得很好。
english: I've just spoken to your French teacher and he says you're doing well in his class.

chinese: 我們需要人力仲介公司幫我們找到合適的人來擔任這個管理職位。
english: We'll need a head hunting agency to find the right man for this executive position.

chinese: 即使我在學校學習了三年，我仍然不擅長說法語。
english: Even though I studied French for three years in school, I'm not good at speaking it.

chinese: 他不是因為想家，而是因為沒錢才回來的。
english: He came back not because he was homesick, but because he was running short of money.

chinese: 我知道你已經等很久了，但你能再等一小會嗎？
english: I know you've been waiting a long time, but could you wait just a little bit longer?

chinese: 如果你想做對一件事，有時候你得親力親為。
english: If you want something to be done right, sometimes you've just got to do it yourself.

chinese: 如果系統工程師繼續離開，公司的競爭優勢將會被削弱。
english: The company's competitive edge will be eroded if system engineers continue to leave.

chinese: 訪客通常在進入一戶日本人家之前會被要求脫鞋。
english: Visitors are usually asked to remove their shoes before they enter a Japanese house.

chinese: 為什麼我們糾纏細枝末節而不進入正題呢？
english: Why don't we stop arguing over these piddling matters and get to the issues at hand?

chinese: 一個成長中的孩子如果沒有充足的能量，可能需要藥物治療。
english: A growing child who doesn't seem to have much energy perhaps needs medical attention.

chinese: 全盤考慮後，我覺得你應該回家，照顧你的父母。
english: All things considered, I think you should go back home and take care of your parents.

chinese: 在倫敦，警察總是擔心在列車或地鐵上發現炸彈。
english: In London, the police are always worried about finding a bomb on the train or subway.

chinese: 女士們，先生們，由於機場的意外情況，我們的著陸將被推遲。
english: Ladies and gentlemen, due to an accident at the airport, our arrival will be delayed.

chinese: 除了那些我們嘗試過的政府形態，民主是最差的那種了。
english: Democracy is the worst form of government, except all the others that have been tried.

chinese: 假如能回到過去讓人生再來一遍的話，你希望能回到幾歲的時候？
english: If you could go back and start your life again, from what age would you like to start?

chinese: 謝謝你在我貧困潦倒之時借給我$500。
english: Thank you very much for lending me $500 when I was having difficulty making ends meet.

chinese: 今天午餐時間，我們常去的飯館關門了，因為他們家在辦喪事。
english: At lunchtime today, our usual restaurant was closed because of a funeral in the family.

chinese: 一個國家紙的產量和它的文明程度密切相關。
english: The amount of paper produced by a country is closely related to its cultural standards.

chinese: 湯姆名義上市公司的領導。他兒子做所有重大決策。
english: Tom is the head of the company in name only. His son makes all the important decisions.

chinese: 湯姆的媽媽是一名護士，她所在的醫院就在瑪麗住的那條街的對面。
english: Tom's mother is a nurse at the hospital that's across the street from where Mary lives.

chinese: 每天早上吃一隻活青蛙, 那麼你一天中其他的時間就不會發生什麼更糟糕的事了。
english: Eat a live frog every morning, and nothing worse will happen to you the rest of the day.

chinese: 我不認為湯姆會把事情的真相告訴我們。
english: I don't think that it's very likely that Tom will tell us the truth about what happened.

chinese: 我必須要換衣服，因為我現在穿的衣服不適合這個環境。
english: I had to change clothes because what I was wearing wasn't appropriate for the situation.

chinese: 因為空氣汙染的問題，也許有一天自行車會取代汽車。
english: Because of the problem of air pollution, the bicycle may some day replace the automobile.

chinese: 無論我們是否喜歡電腦，它在我們的生活中始終起著重要的作用。
english: Computers are certainly playing an important role in our life, whether we like it or not.

chinese: 我知道你已經等很久了，但你能再等一小會嗎？
english: I know that you've been waiting a long time, but could you wait just a little bit longer?

chinese: 你覺得這本書的哪個譯本比較好？法語的還是英語的？
english: Which translation of this book do you think is better, the French one or the English one?

chinese: 我喜歡這幅畫，不僅是因為它的名氣，而是因為它真的是一個傑作。
english: I like this picture, not just because it's famous, but because it really is a masterpiece.

chinese: 理論上說，理論和實踐沒有區別。但實踐上說，是有的。
english: In theory, there is no difference between theory and practice. But, in practice, there is.

chinese: 455名婦女中會有一名直到懷孕第二十週前沒有意識到自己懷孕。
english: One out of 455 women doesn't realize she's pregnant until the twentieth week of pregnancy.

chinese: 南極因為有大陸，所以氣溫低於北極。
english: Owing to its landmass, the Antarctic has an air temperature lower than that of the Arctic.

chinese: 由於它的起源，加拿大英語具有美國英語和​​英國英語兩者的特色。
english: Because of its origins, Canadian English has features of both American and British English.

chinese: 對於其他的六億人口而言，英語不是第二語言就是外語。
english: For the other 600 million people, English is either a second language or a foreign language.

chinese: 孤獨的人會孤獨，是因為他畏懼他人。
english: Lonely people tend to be afraid of meeting others, which ensures they will always be lonely.

chinese: 那家館子物美價廉，美中不足的是他們糟糕的位置。
english: That place's food is delicious and their prices are low. However, their location isn't good.

chinese: 在人際交往中，第一印象決定著將要發生的事情內容的百分之五十以上。
english: When people meet, first impressions determine more than 50 percent of whatever happens next.

chinese: “你漏寫了一個撇號。it's和its是有分別的。” “我知道。是我打錯了。”
english: "There's an apostrophe missing. It's and its are different." "I know. It was a typing error."

chinese: 在日本，在我們的雨季常常下雨，雨季一般在六月中旬至七月中旬。
english: In Japan, it rains quite a bit during our rainy season which is from mid-June until mid-July.

chinese: 現在我們有藍莓、黑莓、櫻桃、草莓、桃子和油桃。
english: Right now, we have blueberries, blackberries, cherries, strawberries, peaches and nectarines.

chinese: 這五年痛苦的癌症治療他終於堅持下來了。
english: Throughout the five years of painful cancer treatments, he managed to keep a stiff upper lip.

chinese: 我們的樂隊剛起步時，只有小城市裡的小俱樂部僱我們。
english: When we started out, our band could only find small clubs in small cities that would hire us.

chinese: 伯拉罕·林肯，美國第16任總統，生於肯塔基州的一個簡陋的小屋裡。
english: Abraham Lincoln, the 16th president of the United States, was born in a log cabin in Kentucky.
For quantities of 20 or more, we can allow you a special discount of 10% on the prices quoted.

chinese: 真的不敢相信你在吃醫生叮囑不要食用的東西。
english: I can't believe you are eating something the doctor has told you repeatedly you shouldn't eat.

chinese: 我覺得當湯姆發現他買來的畫是贗品的時候，他會很生氣。
english: I think Tom is going to be pretty mad when he finds out that the painting he bought is a fake.

chinese: 如果我們應該少聽多說話, 那麼我們應該得到兩個嘴巴一隻耳朵才是。
english: If we were supposed to talk more than listen, we would have been given two mouths and one ear.

chinese: 樂觀者在災禍中看到機會，悲觀者在機會中看到災禍。
english: Optimists see opportunities in disasters while pessimists find disasters in every opportunity.

chinese: 生態印跡與一國的經濟發展程度密切相關。
english: The ecological footprint of a country is closely related to its level of economic development.

chinese: 由於軌道是橢圓形的，行星和太陽之間的距離不會總是相同。
english: Since the orbits are elliptical, the planets do not always have the same distance from the Sun.

chinese: 湯姆試過還回泳衣來換成更大一號的，但是員工告訴他那是不被允許的。
english: Tom tried to return the swimsuit for a larger size, but the clerk told him that wasn't allowed.

chinese: 在十九世紀三十年代的大蕭條時期，許多富人在股市崩盤中失去了一切。
english: During the Depression in the 1930's, many wealthy people lost everything in the stock market crash.

chinese: 我覺得當湯姆發現他買來的畫是贗品的時候，他會很生氣。
english: I think that Tom is going to be pretty mad when he finds out that the painting he bought is a fake.

chinese: 為了不被洪水沖走，有的人緊緊地抱著樹幹長達數個鐘頭。
english: Some people clung to tree branches for several hours to avoid being washed away by the floodwaters.

chinese: 這個工人本來應該在中午十二點到達, 但他被交通堵塞困住了幾個小時。
english: The handyman was supposed to arrive at twelve noon, but got stuck in a traffic jam for a few hours.

chinese: 我父母通常用法語對話，即使我母親的母語是英語。
english: My parents usually speak to each other in French, even though my mother is a native English speaker.

chinese: 你還記得我們還在小學時你和我一起去動物園那次嗎？
english: Do you remember the time you and I went to the zoo together when you and I were in elementary school?

chinese: 就像馬克·諾弗勒早期演唱的歌曲《金錢無用》一樣，絕大多數的人依然高呼贊成“金錢無用論”。
english: The large crowd roared in approval as Mark Knopfler played the first few bars of "Money for Nothing".

chinese: 假如你在老師講課的時候再集中一點去聽講的話，你應該就能弄明白了。
english: If you'd listen a little more carefully to what the teacher says, you'd probably be able to understand.

chinese: 當湯姆開著他破舊的雷澤車來接女兒放學時，他的女兒假裝不認識他。
english: Tom's daughter pretended not to know him when he came to pick her up from school in his battered old car.

chinese: 許多自然環境保護主義者擔心持續屠殺鯨魚正推動這些動物走向滅絕。
english: Many conservationists fear the continuing slaughter of whales is pushing these animals towards extinction.

chinese: 菲律賓去年地震和海嘯造成了超過6000人的死亡。
english: Last year in the Philippines, earthquakes and tidal waves resulted in the deaths of more than 6,000 people.

chinese: “又是湯姆的電話？” “嗯。最近他每天晚上都會打過來。當時就不該給他我的號碼的。”
english: "Is that Tom calling again?" "Yes. He calls every evening these days. I shouldn't have given him my number."

chinese: 我母親的法語比我父親的英語要好，所以他們通常用法語交流。
english: My mother speaks French better than my father speaks English, so they usually speak to each other in French.

chinese: 湯姆不知如何翻譯“計算機”一詞，因為同他談話的人從未見過一臺。
english: Tom didn't know how to translate the word "computer" because the people he was talking to had never seen one.

chinese: 湯姆不喜歡使用”有色人種“這個術語，因為他認為，根據這種說法白種人沒有顏色。
english: Tom doesn't like to use the term "a person of color" because he thinks it implies that white people have no color.

chinese: 你不想塗防曬霜是你的問題，但是曬傷了不要來抱怨。
english: If you don't want to put on sunscreen, that's your problem. Just don't come complaining to me when you get a sunburn.

chinese: 即使是現在，我偶爾還是想見到你。不是今天的你，而是我記憶中曾經的你。
english: Even now, I occasionally think I'd like to see you. Not the you that you are today, but the you I remember from the past.

chinese: 你很容易把母語說得通順流暢，卻很容易把非母語說得不自然。
english: It's very easy to sound natural in your own native language, and very easy to sound unnatural in your non-native language.

chinese: 雖然我被公司解僱了，但是我還有點存款，所以目前不用擔心生計問題。
english: I got fired from the company, but since I have a little money saved up, for the time being, I won't have trouble with living expenses.

chinese: 如果一個人在成人前沒有機會習得目標語言，他對該語言的認識達到母語者程度的機會是相當小的。
english: If a person has not had a chance to acquire his target language by the time he's an adult, he's unlikely to be able to reach native speaker level in that language.
